%! TEX program = xelatex

% ---------------------------------------------------------------------
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{color}
\usepackage[dvipsnames]{xcolor}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\fontspec{Open Sans}
\setmainfont{Open Sans Light}
\newfontfamily\medium{Open Sans}
\usepackage[margin=0cm, top=0.75cm, paperwidth=8.5cm, paperheight=8.5cm]{geometry}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{
  arrows,
  patterns,
  positioning,
  calc,
  fit,
  intersections,
  decorations.text,
  decorations.markings,
  decorations.pathmorphing,
  shadows.blur
}
\pagestyle{empty}

% ---------------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{document}

\begin{center}
\begin{tikzpicture}
    \definecolor{mygray}{gray}{0.2}
    \fill[mygray, rounded corners=5mm] (0, 0) rectangle (6, 2);
    \fill[white] (5, 1.2) circle (0.4);
    \fill[mygray, rounded corners=5mm] (0, -2.5) rectangle (6, -0.5);
    \fill[white] (5, -1.3) circle (0.4);
    \fill[mygray, rounded corners=5mm] (0, -5) rectangle (6, -3);
    \fill[white] (5, -3.8) circle (0.4);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{center}

%----------------------------------------------------------------------
\end{document}
